channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: Futures Express
channel.desc: The host provides a detailed report featuring the latest updates and key developments concerning futures and their performances across various sectors of the market.

channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: Saas, Bahu Aur Sensex
channel.desc: The host invites professional analysts to discuss the latest stock market updates and trends, with a focus on investment opportunities for women traders.

channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: Midcap Mantra
channel.desc: The host presents the latest business trends and updates pertaining to mid-cap companies and interacts with experts for their opinions.

channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: Know Your Company
channel.desc: Expert advisors provide insightful information on investment tips for businesses and the financial performance of various companies.
